DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this pilot study is to determine the feasibility and utility of using the nicotine nasal spray (NNS) in adolescent smokers who want to quit smoking.
DOC.brief_title: Nicotine Replacement and Counseling In Adolescents
DOC.criteria: Be between 15 and 18 yearsold Smoke 5 or more cigarettes per day (cpd) for at least 6 months and want to quit smoking. Adolescents who were using or had used nicotine replacement in the prior week were excluded. Those who used bupropion (ZybanÂ®) within the past 30 days were also excluded.
